name: @markdown-magic/github-contributors
description: Generate GitHub contributors table automatically in markdown - Plugin for markdown-magic

scripts.release:patch: pnpm run build && pnpm version patch && pnpm publish
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run build && pnpm version minor && pnpm publish
scripts.release:major: pnpm run build && pnpm version major && pnpm publish

author: David Wells <hello@davidwells.io>
